text: Grossglockner or Großglockner is the highest mountain in Austria (3798 m). The Pasterze Glacier in Carinthia, Spittal an der Drau District, is on North Side of the mountain chain, directly beneath Großglockner, Kleinglockner and Glocknerwand. == Other websites == Category:Mountains of Austria Category:Carinthia (state) Category:Tyrol (state)
title: Grossglockner
